actions.name: Mace
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage. On a hit  the priest can expend a spell slot to deal 7 (2d6) radiant damage  plus an extra 3 (1d6) radiant damage for each level of the spell slot expended above 1st.

actions.name: Sacred Flame (Cantrip; V, S)
actions.desc: One creature the priest can see within 60 feet makes a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw  taking 9 (2d8) radiant damage on a failure. This spell ignores cover.

actions.name: Invisibility (2nd-Level; V, S, M, Concentration)
actions.desc: The priest or a creature they touch is invisible for 1 hour. The spell ends if the invisible creature attacks or casts a spell.

actions.name: Spirit Guardians (3rd-Level; V, S, M, Concentration)
actions.desc: Spectral forms surround the priest in a 10-foot radius for 10 minutes. The priest can choose creatures they can see to be unaffected by the spell. Other creatures treat the area as difficult terrain  and when a creature enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there  it makes a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw  taking 10 (3d6) radiant or necrotic damage (priests choice) on a failure or half damage on a success.

bonus_actions.name: Healing Word (1st-Level; V)
bonus_actions.desc: The priest or a living creature within 60 feet regains 5 (1d4 + 3) hit points. The priest can't cast this spell and a 1st-level or higher spell on the same turn.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
The priest is a 5th level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13
 +5 to hit with spell attacks). They have the following cleric spells prepared:
 Cantrips (at will): sacred flame
 thaumaturgy
 minor illusion
 1st-level (4 slots): ceremony
 detect evil and good
 healing word
 disguise self
 2nd-level (3 slots): lesser restoration
 invisibility
 3rd-level (2 slots): spirit guardians
 major image
